summary: This FBI 302 form documents the arrest of Jeffrey Epstein at Teterboro Airport in New Jersey on July 6, 2019, pursuant to a federal arrest warrant for sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy. It details the timing, location, and law enforcement personnel involved in the arrest operation.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Arrested at Teterboro Airport on a federal warrant for sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy to commit sex trafficking.

events.title: Arrest of Jeffrey Epstein
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested by FBI Special Agents and Task Force Officers at Teterboro Airport in New Jersey upon his arrival from Paris, France, based on a federal arrest warrant for sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy.

events.title: Initial court appearance
events.description: Jeffrey Epstein was scheduled for an initial court appearance after being held at the Metropolitan Correctional Center.

keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein was arrested on July 6, 2019, at approximately 5:30 PM at Teterboro Airport in New Jersey upon arriving from Paris, France.
The arrest was based on a federal warrant issued in the Southern District of New York for sex trafficking of minors and conspiracy to commit sex trafficking.
Epstein was read his rights and requested to speak with his lawyer before any questioning by law enforcement.
The arrest operation involved multiple FBI Special Agents, Task Force Officers, Customs and Border Protection agents, and NYPD personnel.
Epstein was transported to the Metropolitan Correctional Center in New York to await his initial court appearance on July 8, 2019.
